statements: SELECT sr_id, player_id, report, date_submitted, scout_name FROM scouting_reports
SELECT player_id, report, scout_name, sr_id, date_submitted FROM scouting_reports
SELECT date_submitted, sr_id, scout_name, report, player_id FROM scouting_reports
SELECT player_id, scout_name FROM scouting_reports
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE scout_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, scout_name, date_submitted FROM scouting_reports WHERE sr_id > 1000 ORDER BY player_id ASC, date_submitted DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT scout_name FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id IN (5, 10, 15) AND date_submitted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY scout_name;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM scouting_reports GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(sr_id) AS avg_report_id FROM scouting_reports WHERE scout_name LIKE 'John%' OR scout_name LIKE 'Alice%' GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avg_report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_id = 'f7e78491-247a-4a72-af3e-447b6f889117';
SELECT player_id, scout_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM scouting_reports GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT contract_id, player_id, agent_id, start_date, contract_value FROM player_contracts WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, MAX(contract_value) AS max_contract_value FROM player_contracts GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE scout_id = '92eb5e2a-d4d9-4b38-a8e6-d699cc11b27f' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(contract_value) AS avg_contract_value FROM player_contracts GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(contract_value) > 50000 ORDER BY avg_contract_value DESC;
SELECT scout_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM scouting_reports GROUP BY scout_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_reports ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_id, scout_name, report_date FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT scout_name, report_description FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT player_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM player_contracts ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agency_name FROM agent_relationships WHERE player_id = '3723af65-810a-4b8f-abb1-7d64ffdbe0c7';
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_id, scout_name FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY scout_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM player_contracts
SELECT pr.player_id, pr.scout_name, pc.contract_amount FROM scouting_reports pr INNER JOIN player_contracts pc ON pr.player_id = pc.player_id
SELECT ar.agent_name, ar.agency_name, pr.report_description FROM agent_relationships ar LEFT JOIN scouting_reports pr ON ar.player_id = pr.player_id ORDER BY ar.agent_name
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_name, nationality FROM player_details WHERE position='Forward';
SELECT report_id, scout_name, report_date FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, team FROM player_contracts WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT agent_name, player_name, team FROM agent_relationships JOIN player_contracts ON agent_relationships.player_id = player_contracts.player_id ORDER BY agent_name;
SELECT player_name, nationality, date_of_birth FROM player_details ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, position, team FROM player_details INNER JOIN player_contracts ON player_details.player_id = player_contracts.player_id WHERE team = 'Manchester United';

SELECT agent_name, player_name, team FROM agent_relationships INNER JOIN player_details ON agent_relationships.player_id = player_details.player_id INNER JOIN player_contracts ON agent_relationships.contract_id = player_contracts.contract_id ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, player_id, report_date, scout_name FROM scouting_reports WHERE report LIKE '%top prospect%';
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT player_id, scout_name, report_date FROM scouting_reports;
SELECT scout_name, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_contracts ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM scouting_reports WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, scout_name FROM scouting_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, report_text FROM scouting_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, stadium_name FROM teams;
